field_answer.value:
About Cards Component

  • Each card has Title, Short Title, Media Image, Summary, CTA link and a configurable layout option available
  • An editor can choose to display a card with 
    • Image first followed by Card Title, Summary and link
    • Image as latter component
    • Display cards in a 3X grid
  • An editor has the flexibility to add as many cards as required in the content

About Cards Component

  • Each card has Title, Short Title, Media Image, Summary, CTA link and a configurable layout option available
  • An editor can choose to display a card with 
    • Image first followed by Card Title, Summary and link
    • Image as latter component
    • Display cards in a 3X grid
  • An editor has the flexibility to add as many cards as required in the content
